name: Soham Penshanwar
tagline: Engineering privacy-first AI systems & secure infrastructures ‚Äî where machine learning meets data sovereignty.
bio: Final-year BTech (Hons. Cyber Security) in AI & Data Science, crafting privacy-preserving machine learning pipelines, secure backend architectures, and compliance-ready fintech platforms. Passionate about building production-grade, scalable solutions that uphold user trust while delivering intelligent, real-world impact.

projects.title: REDACT ‚Äî Privacy Shield
projects.description: Production-ready Chrome Extension (Manifest V3) for intelligent document redaction. Features AI-powered PII detection, multi-format support (PDF, DOCX, images), and context-aware synthetic data generation. Built with FastAPI backend, spaCy NLP, OpenCV, and comprehensive audit logging for GDPR compliance.
highlights: Smart AI redaction with 95%+ accuracy for PII detection
Multi-format processing: PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, CSV, Images
Face detection & blurring using dlib 68-point landmarks
Configurable redaction levels (25%, 50%, 75%, 100%)
GDPR-compliant audit logging and consent management
Zero-persistence architecture with automatic file cleanup

projects.title: ANPR Toll Collection System
projects.description: Enterprise-grade Automatic Number Plate Recognition system for toll collection with React 19 frontend, FastAPI backend, and real-time video processing. Features multi-algorithm plate detection, confidence scoring, automated payment processing, and hardware integration for barrier control.
highlights: Multi-algorithm detection: Haar Cascades + Contour Analysis
Real-time video processing with FFmpeg optimization
Dynamic toll pricing with vehicle type classification
Automated payment processing & account management
Hardware integration: camera, sensors, barrier control
Production-ready with health monitoring & logging

projects.title: PolicyVault Nexus
projects.description: RBI-compliant data sharing platform for fintech applications. Implements FF3-1 format-preserving encryption, zero-persistence APIs, real-time consent enforcement, and secure tokenization. Built with FastAPI and Quarkus for high-performance financial data processing.
highlights: RBI DPDP Act 2023 compliance framework
FF3-1 format-preserving encryption for sensitive data
Zero-persistence architecture with in-memory processing
Real-time consent management and policy enforcement
High-performance APIs with sub-100ms response times
Comprehensive audit trails for regulatory compliance

projects.title: Crowd Counting using CSRNet
projects.description: Deep learning solution for crowd density estimation using CSRNet (Congested Scene Recognition Network). Implements dilated convolutions for multi-scale feature extraction and generates accurate density maps for crowd analysis in complex scenes.
highlights: CSRNet implementation with dilated convolutions
Multi-scale feature extraction for dense crowds
Trained on ShanghaiTech dataset with data augmentation
Real-time density map generation
Optimized for GPU acceleration with CUDA support
Achieves competitive MAE/MSE scores on benchmark datasets

projects.title: Indian Sign Language Recognition
projects.description: Computer vision-based Indian Sign Language recognition system that converts hand gestures into text and speech. Uses MediaPipe for hand landmark detection and custom CNN models for gesture classification, making digital communication more accessible.
highlights: Real-time hand gesture recognition using MediaPipe
Custom CNN architecture for ISL alphabet classification
Text-to-speech conversion for accessibility
Real-time video processing with 30+ FPS performance
Support for 26 ISL alphabets with 90%+ accuracy
Inclusive design for hearing-impaired community
Managed budgets exceeding ‚Çπ5L+ for 12+ technical events and workshops
Led  in organising workshops and  competitions
Coordinated with industry partners for sponsorships and technical sessions
Organized AI/ML workshops for 200+ students with hands-on projects
Marketed Free and Open Source Software
Developed prototype implementations for FOSS
Increased Awareness for FOSS
Contributing to open-source privacy tools and libraries
Built Backends in Php
